title: Hearing preference
h1: Would you be able to take part in hearings by video and phone?
p1: If your case goes to a hearing, it can take place either:
bullet1: in person, in a room at a tribunal (‘face-to-face’)
bullet2: by video (where you can join from a place suitable to you)
p2: Some hearings use a combination of these methods. The approach take will be decided by a judge. It may depend on the type of claim.
checkbox1: Yes, I can take part in video hearings
checkbox2: Yes, I can take part in phone hearings
checkbox3: No, I cannot take part in either video or phone hearings
checkbox3Hint: If you choose this option please tell us why in case we can assist you
explain: Explain why you are unable to take part in video or phone hearings
